section.p: The inner keep of the castle is a mighty fortress with walls several metres thick. Narrow windows admit golden shafts of sunlight into the gloomy hallway.

p.if: If you have the title Paladin of Ravayne then you know these ancient halls well, and there is even a private chamber set aside for your use.

choices.choice: Visit the chapel of the god Elnir
Request an audience with the baroness
